titles.title: A concurrent resolution to correct the enrollment of H.R. 2642.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/14/1988--Introduced. Makes corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 2642 (Colorado Ute Indian Water Rights Settlement Act of 1987).
